00:00:01:200000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:00:01:200000.Dialogue: The entrance to the dungeon is a moss covered door. You manage to open it only to find yourself face-to-face with a hideous, foul-smelling, moss-covered ogre. What do you do?

00:00:13:210000.Speaker: Howard
00:00:13:210000.Dialogue: I say, Hey, Ma, what's for dinner?

00:00:19:090000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:00:19:090000.Dialogue: Seventeen. The ogre is amused by your joke and allows you to pass.

00:00:26:100000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:00:26:100000.Dialogue: By the by, I liked it, too.

00:00:31:010000.Speaker: Leonard
00:00:31:010000.Dialogue: How go the wedding plans, Howard?

00:00:32:190000.Speaker: Howard
00:00:32:190000.Dialogue: Great. We spent five hours last night at Macy's registering for gifts. Looks like I'm finally going to have that darling little earthenware asparagus dish I've always wanted.

00:00:40:230000.Speaker: Leonard
00:00:40:230000.Dialogue: See, this is the good thing about having a girlfriend 9,000 miles away. I can spend my nights doing whatever I want.

00:00:47:190000.Speaker: Howard
00:00:47:190000.Dialogue: You mean like playing nerd games with us and then taking a suspiciously long shower?

00:01:03:110000.Speaker: Howard
00:01:03:110000.Dialogue: Really? So we're playing Dungeons & Dragons and we walk into a dungeon and see a dragon?

00:01:09:180000.Speaker: Howard
00:01:09:180000.Dialogue: Isn't that a little on the nose?

00:01:12:040000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:01:12:040000.Dialogue: When you play Chutes and Ladders, do you complain about all the chutes and all the ladders?

00:01:18:040000.Speaker: Leonard
00:01:18:040000.Dialogue: Are you gonna eat that whole pie?

00:01:21:080000.Speaker: Raj
00:01:21:080000.Dialogue: Maybe. Why not? Who do I have in my life to watch my figure for?

00:01:27:230000.Speaker: Leonard
00:01:27:230000.Dialogue: Oh, God, did you watch Bridget Jones again?

00:01:30:230000.Speaker: Raj
00:01:30:230000.Dialogue: No, it's just that everybody's got someone. Sheldon's with Amy, Howard's getting married, you're dating my sister.

00:01:37:200000.Speaker: Leonard
00:01:37:200000.Dialogue: Now that Howard's getting married, maybe he'll inflate one of his old girlfriends for you.

00:01:43:130000.Speaker: Raj
00:01:43:130000.Dialogue: You know who I blame for my loneliness? The United States of America. Your movies and your TV shows promised streets paved with beautiful blonde women with big bazongas.

00:01:53:230000.Speaker: Howard
00:01:53:230000.Dialogue: Eat another pie, you'll have your own bazongas.

00:01:57:120000.Speaker: Raj
00:01:57:120000.Dialogue: That's cruel. You know it goes straight to my hips.

00:02:01:110000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:02:01:110000.Dialogue: Gentlemen, please focus. You're facing a fire-breathing dragon.

00:02:05:110000.Speaker: Raj
00:02:05:110000.Dialogue: I don't know if I want to play anymore.

00:02:07:040000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:02:07:040000.Dialogue: Because you don't have a girlfriend? Well, good Lord, if that becomes a reason not to play Dungeons & Dragons, this game's in serious trouble.

00:02:42:160000.Speaker: Amy
00:02:42:160000.Dialogue: Now, I assume we use this same wax later on to neaten up each other's bikini regions.

00:02:47:230000.Speaker: Penny
00:02:47:230000.Dialogue: Yeah, my bikini region is fine.

00:02:56:060000.Speaker: Amy
00:02:56:060000.Dialogue: So, Bernadette, how's the wedding planning going? And I'm not asking as a prospective bridesmaid. Pick me! Pick me!

00:03:04:160000.Speaker: Bernadette
00:03:04:160000.Dialogue: We went cake-tasting yesterday. Raj came along. He cried and ate half the samples.

00:03:12:230000.Speaker: Penny
00:03:12:230000.Dialogue: Oh, the poor guy's so lonely. We should set him up with someone.

00:03:16:220000.Speaker: Bernadette
00:03:16:220000.Dialogue: You know, I met a really cute girl at work. She's married to a guy in one of our drug trials.

00:03:27:130000.Speaker: Bernadette
00:03:27:130000.Dialogue: Yeah, but her husband is in serious congestive heart failure, and a little birdie told me he's in the placebo group.

00:03:38:030000.Speaker: Penny
00:03:38:030000.Dialogue: Okay, so future grief-stricken widow is the one to beat.

00:03:46:090000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:03:46:090000.Dialogue: One moment. I'm conducting an experiment.

00:03:54:080000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:03:54:080000.Dialogue: Yes. From here on in, I've decided to make all trivial decisions with a throw of the dice, thus freeing up my mind do what it does best-- enlighten and amaze.

00:04:17:070000.Speaker: Penny
00:04:17:070000.Dialogue: Um, Howard, can I see you for a minute, please?

00:04:20:120000.Speaker: Howard
00:04:20:120000.Dialogue: I don't want to show any more of your friends how I can fit in the booster seats.

00:04:26:040000.Speaker: Penny
00:04:26:040000.Dialogue: Uh, no, that's not it. Just come with me, please.

00:04:30:210000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:04:30:210000.Dialogue: Let's see what I'll be washing that succotash down with. A pitcher of margaritas.

00:04:42:180000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:04:42:180000.Dialogue: That's the great thing. It doesn't matter. My mind is freed up to think about more important things.

00:04:54:140000.Speaker: Penny
00:04:54:140000.Dialogue: Um, Raj, there's someone I want you to meet. This is my friend Emily. I know her from my spin class.

00:05:03:110000.Speaker: Penny
00:05:03:110000.Dialogue: Raj, relax. She can't hear you. She's deaf.

00:05:07:080000.Speaker: Howard
00:05:07:080000.Dialogue: Emily, this is our friend Raj.

00:05:14:130000.Speaker: Penny
00:05:14:130000.Dialogue: Look at you guys just hitting it off. I am so good.

00:05:28:180000.Speaker: Howard
00:05:28:180000.Dialogue: She says, It's nice to meet you

00:05:30:100000.Speaker: Raj
00:05:30:100000.Dialogue: Does she really mean that or was she signing it sarcastically?

00:05:34:210000.Speaker: Howard
00:05:34:210000.Dialogue: Raj says it's nice to meet you, too. She says she has to go back to her family, but Penny has her number if you want to text her and get together.

00:05:45:130000.Speaker: Raj
00:05:45:130000.Dialogue: Okay, I'm going to play it cool. Tell her, Maybe. Whatever, babe.

00:05:58:160000.Speaker: Raj
00:05:58:160000.Dialogue: Look at that. I have a date. I love America again.

00:06:06:160000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:06:06:160000.Dialogue: And now for dessert... Come on, hot fudge sundae, come on, hot fudge sundae. Bam! That's what I'm talking about!

00:06:16:120000.Speaker: Raj
00:06:16:120000.Dialogue: Okay, as soon as she gets here, so she knows I'm cool with it, I'm going to make a joke about her being deaf.

00:06:26:010000.Speaker: Raj
00:06:26:010000.Dialogue: I was thinking, Hey, did you hear the one about...? Oh, no, I bet you didn't.

00:06:33:070000.Speaker: Howard
00:06:33:070000.Dialogue: Maybe we should revisit your lonely fat guy plan.

00:06:46:210000.Speaker: Howard
00:06:46:210000.Dialogue: She says she's sorry she's late.

00:06:48:120000.Speaker: Raj
00:06:48:120000.Dialogue: Tell her it doesn't matter. Tell her, her eyes shimmer like opalescent lilies in the lake of the palace of the celestial maidens.

00:06:58:090000.Speaker: Howard
00:06:58:090000.Dialogue: Really? That's the first thing you want to say?

00:07:01:220000.Speaker: Raj
00:07:01:220000.Dialogue: I worked on it all night. Use it.

00:07:03:160000.Speaker: Howard
00:07:03:160000.Dialogue: Look, I don't know the sign for opalescent.

00:07:06:210000.Speaker: Howard
00:07:06:210000.Dialogue: I don't know how to spell it.

00:07:13:180000.Speaker: Raj
00:07:13:180000.Dialogue: You're making me sound like a caveman.

00:07:17:090000.Speaker: Howard
00:07:17:090000.Dialogue: She says, Thank you. You have nice eyes, too.

00:07:19:100000.Speaker: Raj
00:07:19:100000.Dialogue: Really? Ask her how many children she wants, and whatever number she says, say, Me, too.

00:07:29:170000.Speaker: Raj
00:07:29:170000.Dialogue: Fine. Tell her I have a deep, sexy voice like James Earl Jones.

00:07:34:160000.Speaker: Howard
00:07:34:160000.Dialogue: She doesn't know what James Earl Jones sounds like.

00:07:38:120000.Speaker: Raj
00:07:38:120000.Dialogue: Great. Then she won't know I'm lying.

00:07:43:220000.Speaker: Raj
00:07:43:220000.Dialogue: Let's see, what else can I tell you about me that would make you like me?

00:07:51:080000.Speaker: Raj
00:07:51:080000.Dialogue: Ooh, I love music. Do you love music?

00:07:55:180000.Speaker: Howard
00:07:55:180000.Dialogue: You really want to ask her that?

00:08:04:200000.Speaker: Howard
00:08:04:200000.Dialogue: She says, Do you play an instrument?

00:08:07:100000.Speaker: Raj
00:08:07:100000.Dialogue: No, but when I was six years old, I tried to start a boy band called Frankie Goes to Bollywood.

00:08:17:210000.Speaker: Raj
00:08:17:210000.Dialogue: But I couldn't get any other boys to join, so my parents asked the servants to be my backup dancers.

00:08:25:010000.Speaker: Raj
00:08:25:010000.Dialogue: Wait, when you sign servants, don't sign it like I'm bragging. Sign it in a way that I sound humble with just a hint of That's right, I had servants.

00:08:37:110000.Speaker: Raj
00:08:37:110000.Dialogue: Yes, but she doesn't. So get signing, hand monkey.

00:08:44:230000.Speaker: Howard
00:08:44:230000.Dialogue: I think I wrote a letter to Santa Claus every day.

00:08:49:150000.Speaker: Howard
00:08:49:150000.Dialogue: And then on Christmas morning, under the tree is a little puppy with a red ribbon.

00:08:58:160000.Speaker: Howard
00:08:58:160000.Dialogue: Texting Bernadette that I'm gonna be late.

00:09:02:160000.Speaker: Howard
00:09:02:160000.Dialogue: It's a funny story about a puppy. Just smile and laugh.

00:09:10:180000.Speaker: Howard
00:09:10:180000.Dialogue: The puppy died-- it choked on a doll head. Sad face, sad face!

00:09:17:150000.Speaker: Raj
00:09:17:150000.Dialogue: It's a little hard to see with the city lights, but that W-shaped constellation is Cassiopeia. And she was the mother of Andromeda who's over there.

00:09:33:120000.Speaker: Howard
00:09:33:120000.Dialogue: This is her car. She hopes she can see you again sometime.

00:09:38:130000.Speaker: Raj
00:09:38:130000.Dialogue: Good, good. Oh, boy, help me out here. Does she want me to kiss her or not?

00:09:44:160000.Speaker: Howard
00:09:44:160000.Dialogue: I speak sign language, I don't read minds.

00:09:47:080000.Speaker: Raj
00:09:47:080000.Dialogue: If you were me, would you kiss her?

00:09:48:130000.Speaker: Howard
00:09:48:130000.Dialogue: Yeah, but I'm a make out king.

00:10:00:160000.Speaker: Raj
00:10:00:160000.Dialogue: I was so smooth on that date.

00:10:04:050000.Speaker: Howard
00:10:04:050000.Dialogue: You? I made you smooth. You were an idiot.

00:10:09:130000.Speaker: Howard
00:10:09:130000.Dialogue: It might've been on your lips, but it was my kiss.

00:10:12:100000.Speaker: Raj
00:10:12:100000.Dialogue: Oh, fine. Let's agree she kissed both of us.

00:10:23:180000.Speaker: Penny
00:10:23:180000.Dialogue: Mustache is looking good there, Sheldon.

00:10:29:140000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:10:29:140000.Dialogue: Don't thank me. Thank the dice. They told me what percentage of my face to shave.

00:10:34:140000.Speaker: Howard
00:10:34:140000.Dialogue: Why are you still doing this?

00:10:36:090000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:10:36:090000.Dialogue: Because it's working. In the past few weeks, unburdened by trivial decisions, I've co-authored two papers in notable peer-reviewed journals, and I'm close to figuring out why the Large Hadron Collider has yet to isolate the Higgs boson particle.

00:10:50:160000.Speaker: Leonard
00:10:50:160000.Dialogue: You left out, got chafed testicles because you no longer wear underpants.

00:10:58:090000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:10:58:090000.Dialogue: The dice giveth and the dice taketh away.

00:11:03:060000.Speaker: Penny
00:11:03:060000.Dialogue: Is Raj out with Emily again?

00:11:05:040000.Speaker: Leonard
00:11:05:040000.Dialogue: Yeah, every night for the last month.

00:11:07:040000.Speaker: Penny
00:11:07:040000.Dialogue: Wow, can't believe he has a girlfriend.

00:11:14:010000.Speaker: Howard
00:11:14:010000.Dialogue: Here's some other fun news on the Raj/Emily front. He gave her a pair of diamond earrings and leased her a car.

00:11:21:180000.Speaker: Leonard
00:11:21:180000.Dialogue: You think she's taking advantage of him?

00:11:23:170000.Speaker: Penny
00:11:23:170000.Dialogue: Oh, of course not. She wouldn't do something like that. She's deaf.

00:11:30:050000.Speaker: Leonard
00:11:30:050000.Dialogue: Deaf women can't be gold diggers?

00:11:33:070000.Speaker: Penny
00:11:33:070000.Dialogue: Handicapped people are nice, Leonard. Everyone knows that.

00:11:38:140000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:11:38:140000.Dialogue: Yeah, I actually have information about Raj that would be helpful with this discussion.

00:11:58:000000.Speaker: Penny
00:11:58:000000.Dialogue: Wait, hang on. Doubles. Roll again.

00:12:07:060000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:12:07:060000.Dialogue: It doesn't matter if he's showering her with gifts, because the Koothrappalis are vastly wealthy.

00:12:13:160000.Speaker: Penny
00:12:13:160000.Dialogue: What do you mean vastly wealthy?

00:12:15:010000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:12:15:010000.Dialogue: Well, wealthy means a lot of money. Vastly means even more. I'm not sure what's tripping you up.

00:12:22:030000.Speaker: Leonard
00:12:22:030000.Dialogue: Look, I know they have money. I don't think it's that much.

00:12:24:010000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:12:24:010000.Dialogue: No, you're wrong. As you know, a few years ago, I achieved one of my lesser dreams and became a notary public. Well, from time to time, I notarize banking documents for Raj. The Koothrappalis aren't just rich, they're Richie Rich rich.

00:12:41:130000.Speaker: Penny
00:12:41:130000.Dialogue: Well, so how much is that?

00:12:43:110000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:12:43:110000.Dialogue: About halfway between Bruce Wayne and Scrooge McDuck.

00:12:48:020000.Speaker: Howard
00:12:48:020000.Dialogue: What the hell? The last time we went to the zoo, that son of a bitch made me buy him a churro.

00:12:53:090000.Speaker: Leonard
00:12:53:090000.Dialogue: Listen, guys, I'm sorry, I don't mean to be rude, but I need to go call Raj's sister, who I love so much.

00:13:05:170000.Speaker: Penny
00:13:05:170000.Dialogue: Okay, so he's got money, and it's a few gifts and a car.

00:13:10:170000.Speaker: Howard
00:13:10:170000.Dialogue: And she got him to pay off all her credit cards.

00:13:12:190000.Speaker: Penny
00:13:12:190000.Dialogue: What? He paid off her credit cards? Damn it, I could've dated Raj for a couple months.

00:13:20:050000.Speaker: Penny
00:13:20:050000.Dialogue: But I-I wouldn't have, because I'm not that kind of girl. We should really talk to Raj.

00:13:24:070000.Speaker: Howard
00:13:24:070000.Dialogue: He's not going to listen, he's in love.

00:13:27:030000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:13:27:030000.Dialogue: Can't figure out what to do? I remember those days.

00:13:31:020000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:13:31:020000.Dialogue: Now, if you'll excuse me, I have to... stay right here.

00:13:39:140000.Speaker: Howard
00:13:39:140000.Dialogue: Yeah, this is a bad idea. We should go.

00:13:41:060000.Speaker: Penny
00:13:41:060000.Dialogue: No. I'm the one that introduced him to her. I've got to say something.

00:13:53:220000.Speaker: Howard
00:13:53:220000.Dialogue: Hey, Bernadette doesn't mind where I get my motor running, as long as I park in the right garage.

00:14:01:130000.Speaker: Penny
00:14:01:130000.Dialogue: I can't believe you're engaged to my friend.

00:14:07:200000.Speaker: Howard
00:14:07:200000.Dialogue: Smart. Whisper so the deaf chick can't hear you.

00:14:16:000000.Speaker: Howard
00:14:16:000000.Dialogue: Oh, hey, hi. Nice to see you.

00:14:18:190000.Speaker: Penny
00:14:18:190000.Dialogue: Um, can we talk to you about Raj?

00:14:23:060000.Speaker: Howard
00:14:23:060000.Dialogue: She says, Sure, what about him

00:14:24:190000.Speaker: Penny
00:14:24:190000.Dialogue: Okay, um, gosh, how do I start? Um, see, Raj is kind of naive. I mean, he hasn't dated a whole lot of women. And I'm concerned that, without meaning to, you might be taking advantage of him. You know, by letting him buy you a bunch of expensive things. And I-I... Howard, focus.

00:14:45:200000.Speaker: Howard
00:14:45:200000.Dialogue: Right. Are you a gold digger or not?

00:14:50:170000.Speaker: Howard
00:14:50:170000.Dialogue: Oh, uh, something, something, who the something do you think you are? Mind your own something business and go something yourself.

00:14:59:070000.Speaker: Howard
00:14:59:070000.Dialogue: Oh. Wait, I got this now.

00:15:05:120000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. She answers the door.
00:15:05:120000.Speaker: Raj

00:15:06:230000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. She answers the door.
00:15:06:230000.Speaker: Penny

00:15:08:030000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. She answers the door.
00:15:08:030000.Speaker: Raj
00:15:08:030000.Dialogue: How dare you ambush my girlfriend at the gym!

00:15:10:020000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. She answers the door.
00:15:10:020000.Speaker: Penny
00:15:10:020000.Dialogue: We didn't mean for it to be an ambush. Just, it's kind of impossible not to sneak up on deaf people.

00:15:15:140000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. She answers the door.
00:15:15:140000.Speaker: Penny
00:15:15:140000.Dialogue: And hey, since when are you so chatty?

00:15:19:060000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. She answers the door.
00:15:19:060000.Speaker: Raj

00:15:20:120000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. She answers the door.
00:15:20:120000.Speaker: Penny
00:15:20:120000.Dialogue: Raj, come here. This girl is trouble. I mean, what kind of relationship is it where you buy her gifts and she gives you sex?

00:15:29:030000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. She answers the door.
00:15:29:030000.Speaker: Raj
00:15:29:030000.Dialogue: The best one I ever had!

00:15:32:180000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. She answers the door.
00:15:32:180000.Speaker: Penny
00:15:32:180000.Dialogue: Okay, come on. You know you can do better.

00:15:35:190000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. She answers the door.
00:15:35:190000.Speaker: Raj
00:15:35:190000.Dialogue: Aha. I see what's going on here. You and I had our crazy night together, and now you can't stand to see me with another woman.

00:15:45:200000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. She answers the door.
00:15:45:200000.Speaker: Penny

00:15:49:100000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. She answers the door.
00:15:49:100000.Speaker: Penny

00:15:50:170000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. She answers the door.
00:15:50:170000.Speaker: Raj
00:15:50:170000.Dialogue: Yeah, that's good. Keep telling yourself that.

00:15:54:170000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. She answers the door.
00:15:54:170000.Speaker: Penny
00:15:54:170000.Dialogue: He is cuter now that I know he's rich.

00:16:01:100000.Speaker: Raj
00:16:01:100000.Dialogue: I have a surprise for you. Cover your eyes. Open them.

00:16:19:020000.Speaker: Raj
00:16:19:020000.Dialogue: It's a real ruby. It was a little expensive, but no one can put a price on love. Although, the people at Cartier took a pretty good shot at it.

00:16:38:030000.Speaker: Raj
00:16:38:030000.Dialogue: Oh, Mummy, Daddy. What a nice surprise.

00:16:40:190000.Speaker: Dr Koothrappali
00:16:40:190000.Dialogue: No, it's not a nice surprise, it's a bad surprise.

00:16:47:160000.Speaker: Mrs Koothrappali
00:16:47:160000.Dialogue: She told us you're spending all our money on your new girlfriend.

00:16:50:230000.Speaker: Raj
00:16:50:230000.Dialogue: I just got her a couple of things. She gives me things, too.

00:16:55:190000.Speaker: Dr Koothrappali
00:16:55:190000.Dialogue: Yeah, yeah, I'm a gynecologist. I know exactly what she gives you.

00:17:00:190000.Speaker: Mrs Koothrappali
00:17:00:190000.Dialogue: You need to find a nice Indian girl from a good family. If you keep seeing this woman, you're cut off.

00:17:06:100000.Speaker: Raj
00:17:06:100000.Dialogue: What? You're going to make me choose between the woman I love and the money I... have very strong feelings for?

00:17:31:110000.Speaker: Dr Koothrappali
00:17:31:110000.Dialogue: Well, he's going to find out eventually.

00:17:41:210000.Speaker: Raj
00:17:41:210000.Dialogue: My parents are making me choose between money and you. I choose you. No, I think we'll have to return the car. And that necklace, yeah, that, too. But none of those things matter, because we have something better. We have love.

00:18:13:220000.Speaker: Raj
00:18:13:220000.Dialogue: Oh, Penny, I hurt so bad.

00:18:19:070000.Speaker: Raj
00:18:19:070000.Dialogue: Sometimes I put the TV on mute just to pretend she's still with me.

00:18:29:150000.Speaker: Raj
00:18:29:150000.Dialogue: But I can't watch the closed captioning without crying.

00:18:35:050000.Speaker: Penny
00:18:35:050000.Dialogue: Oh, I'm so sorry. I wish I could make you feel better.

00:18:39:200000.Speaker: Raj
00:18:39:200000.Dialogue: Seriously? I'm heartbroken and you're hitting on me?

00:18:45:100000.Speaker: Raj
00:18:45:100000.Dialogue: Look, Penny, you're great, but I had a long talk with my parents, and they said if I date an Indian girl, I get a Maserati.

00:19:00:050000.Speaker: Raj
00:19:00:050000.Dialogue: Mmm. Oh, cheesecake, you're just as good as a woman, even though I can't have sex with you.

00:19:07:110000.Speaker: Howard
00:19:07:110000.Dialogue: Try throwing it in the microwave for a few seconds.

00:19:14:200000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:19:14:200000.Dialogue: Should I use the rest room or wait until we get home? Come on, papa needs to void his bladder. Oh, that's not what you want to see after three buttermilks.

00:19:25:020000.Speaker: Penny
00:19:25:020000.Dialogue: Here you go, boys. I'll pick it up when you're ready.

00:19:34:030000.Speaker: Penny
00:19:34:030000.Dialogue: Oh, and don't cheap out on the tip. We all know you're loaded now.
